job_description:
Company: FullStack Inc
Position: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
Location: Chicago, IL (Hybrid)
Salary: $110,000 - $155,000

About Us:
FullStack Inc is a software development company that specializes in creating custom web applications. We are passionate about building high-quality software that meets our clients' needs.

Job Description:
We are seeking a Full Stack Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be comfortable working on both the frontend and backend of web applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
- Collaborate with designers and product managers to implement new features.
- Write clean, well-documented, and testable code.
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving our development processes.

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in full-stack development.
- Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, JavaScript, and SQL.
- Experience with RESTful APIs.
- Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with TypeScript.
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
- Experience with testing frameworks like Jest or Cypress.

Benefits:
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- 401(k) with company match.
